commit.message:
crash20.C: Rework to avoid libg++.

        * g++.old-deja/g++.brendan/crash20.C: Rework to avoid libg++.
        * g++.old-deja/g++.brendan/crash30.C: Likewise.
        * g++.old-deja/g++.brendan/crash39.C: Likewise.
        * g++.old-deja/g++.law/operators4.C: Likewise.

From-SVN: r15407

files.patch:
